skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can activate your own scenes by Alexa. The scene, which designed via our ABOX APP, describes a combination of devices set to a specific state.
e.g. You create a new scene called "good night", which contains two sections:
1) turn off the bedroom light
2) turn off the bedroom TV
You tell Alexa: "Alexa, activate good night", then the scene "good night" will perform, the two sections will action as you will.
